sentences.en: At least I am a moviegoer and enjoy killing time in the theater.
sentences.cn: 至少我是一个常看电影的人，喜欢在电影院消磨时光。

sentences.en: As a frequent moviegoer, I am keeping abreast of the latest development of Hollywood movies.
sentences.cn: 我是电影院里的常客，通晓好莱坞电影最新动态。

sentences.en: If a Chinese moviegoer wants to learn about Hayao Miyazaki-style animations, then this is the one to see.
sentences.cn: 如果一位热爱电影的中国人想学习宫崎骏风格的动画，这就是必看影片。
